headline: Keurig Dr Pepper Reshapes Coffee And Beverage Profile With JDE Peet’s Deal
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper (NasdaqGS:KDP) announced an $18b acquisition of coffee group JDE Peet’s. The company plans to split into two pure play businesses, one focused on coffee and one on refreshment beverages, after regulatory approvals. Management outlined an operational timeline that points to meaningful structural changes for the business once the deal closes. Keurig Dr Pepper already spans at home coffee systems and a broad range of packaged drinks, so folding in JDE Peet’s gives it a much...

headline: Wells Fargo Lifts PT on Keurig Dr. Pepper Inc. (KDP) to $40 from $35 – Here’s Why
summary: Keurig Dr. Pepper Inc. (NASDAQ:KDP) is one of the best cheap stocks under $50 to buy right now. Wells Fargo lifted the price target on Keurig Dr. Pepper Inc. (NASDAQ:KDP) to $40 from $35 on February 25, maintaining an Overweight rating on the shares and noting that shares were up 4.2%, closing at the highest […]
